divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking home from work around 23.45, i took the short cut down an alleyway, as i crossed the street something made me look up, i dont know what, thatis when i saw what i thought was an aeroplane but i thought it was too brightfor a plane and too slow. it seemed to stop in midair as i stood lookng at it,it was flashing brightly then it slowly went behind a house i stood back andcould still see it, i continued to walk expecting to see it between the housesbut i was gone
Summary: i saw a bright light pulsating in the sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in surbiton surrey
This sighting has never been favorited.
